name: Mastery Talisman: Airborne Reinforcements
description:
When you perform "Switch Character": Consider this Switch to be a Fast Action rather than a Combat Action.
When you perform a Plunging Attack: Deal +2 DMG.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you perform "Switch Character":</color> Consider this Switch to be a $[K2] rather than a $[K1].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When you perform a $[K52]:</color> Deal +2 DMG.
